TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FlowSwitch`1<T> extends System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode

Docs.typeparam: The type of the expression to evaluate against cases.
Docs.summary: A specialized that allows modeling a switch construct, with one expression and one outcome for each match.

remarks.format:

Docs.summary: Gets a dictionary of cases to be processed by the element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each element in the dictionary consists of an object of the generic type specified in <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowSwitch%601.%23ctor%2A> and a corresponding <xref:System.Activities.Statements.FlowNode> to execute.
